name: Super Platformer (itch) (crashingintogames)
description:
* Complete the speed run and back to the start will report your time and reward you with a parachute - use space to use it :)

*** CONTROLS *** * Use arrow keys or WASD to control the player * Z is alternative crouch, SPACE alternative jump * Press 'N' to show all players names * Hold E or R to open Emoji panels
